description: ITTC - Iraq Technology Training Center ITTC is part of the Iraq Technology Solutions group specializes in providing professional development and training in information technology. The center aims to enhance industry professionals' technical skills and capabilities through comprehensive and integrated training programs.
description2: To be the leading institute in providing specialized professional training that enhances the skills of engineers and technicians, enabling them to keep up with technological advancements in infrastructure and engineering fields.
description3: To deliver specialized and practical training programs focused on developing technical and professional skills of engineers and technicians, utilizing the latest tools and technologies to ensure the effective application of engineering standards in real-world projects.
AboutUs: ITTC offers a wide range of courses that cover the latest technologies and trends in IT, ensuring that professionals can improve their technical skills and stay up-to-date with the rapidly evolving technological landscape. We strive to empower both individuals and companies by equipping them with the knowledge and tools they need to succeed in an ever-changing technological environment.
Subject: Subject
address: Hariri Building, Al-Huria Square, Al-Karada, Baghdad, Iraq,
